org.cooperari.core.aspectj

Class WeavingConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cooperari.core.aspectj.WeavingConfiguration

  • public final class WeavingConfiguration
extends Object
    AspectJ weaving configuration.

    An object of this type can be used to produce an XML file that is suitable for setting up load-time weaving by AspectJ. [the format is described here ].

    Since:
    0.2

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Constructs a new weaving configuration.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WeavingConfiguration

        public WeavingConfiguration()
        Constructs a new weaving configuration. Initially, no aspects or weaver options are set.

    • Method Detail

      • declareAspect

        public void declareAspect(Class<?> c)
        Declare an aspect described by a class instance.
        Parameters:
        c - Class for the aspect.

      • declareAspect

        public void declareAspect(String className)
        Declare an aspect identified by a class name.

        The class name should be in a canonical format, i.e., it should be formatted with the traditional "dot" notation, as returned by Class.getCanonicalName().

        Parameters:
        className - Class name.

      • useAspect

        public void useAspect(String pattern)
        Enable the use of aspects that match a given pattern.
        Parameters:
        pattern - Matching pattern.

      • doNotUseAspect

        public void doNotUseAspect(String pattern)
        Disable the use of aspects that match a given pattern.
        Parameters:
        pattern - Matching pattern.

                            String name,

        Add an inline aspect.
        Parameters:
        abstractAspect - Parent abstract aspect.
        name - Name of aspect.
        pointcutName - Pointcut expression.
        pointcutExpr - Pointcut expression.

      • enableDump

        public void enableDump(String pattern)
        Enable class dump before and after weaving for classes that match a given pattern.
        Parameters:
        pattern - Matching pattern.

      • enableDumpForAllClasses

        public void enableDumpForAllClasses()
        Enable class dump for all classes. The call is equivalent to enableDump("*").

      • saveAsXML

        public void saveAsXML(File file)
               throws IOException
        Save configuration to a file in XML format.
        Parameters:
        file - File object.
        Throws:
        IOException - If a file I/O error occurs.

      • getRootElement

        public Element getRootElement()
        Get the current configuration in DOM format. Note that a deep copy of the internal DOM element is returned.
        Returns:
        An Element object for the current configuration.

      • print

        public void print(OutputStream os)
        Print configuration in XML format to an output stream.
        Parameters:
        os - Output stream.

      • create

        public static WeavingConfiguration create(CInstrument config,
                                          Class<?> clazz)
        Get a weave configuration for a given class taking a CInstrument instance as source configuration.
        Parameters:
        config - An instance of CInstrument.
        clazz - Class subject to configuration.
        Returns:
        A WeavingConfiguration object.

      • getAspectClasses

        public List<Class<?>> getAspectClasses()
        Get a list of all declared aspect classes.
        Returns:
        A list containing the declared aspect classes.

      • saveAsJAR

        public void saveAsJAR(File aspectsFile,
                      File outputFile)
               throws IOException
        Save configuration to JAR file.
        Parameters:
        aspectsFile - Compiled aspects JAR file (class files will be copied to the output file).
        outputFile - Output JAR file.
        Throws:
        IOException - If a file I/O error occurs.
